sentences.english: The horse broke away from my horse pole and ran wild .
sentences.chinese: 这匹烈马挣断了我的套马杆狂奔起来。

sentences.english: Host poling in hands, Mengke threw himself on the horse, feeling full of strength.
sentences.chinese: 手持套马杆，纵身跃上马背，孟克觉得自己充满力量。
